import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import "./profile.css" import Danutu from "../../assets/img/danutu.jpg" import Safe from "./../../assets/img/Medals/Safe.png" import Complete from "./../../assets/img/Medals/Completed Workouts.png" import Cardio from "./../../assets/img/Medals/Cardio King.png" import Smart from "./../../assets/img/Medals/Smart.png" import Fabulous from "./../../assets/img/Medals/Fabulous.png" import New from "./../../assets/img/Medals/New.png" import King from "./../../assets/img/Medals/Gym King.png" import $ from 'jquery' function Profile() { // const nameBefore = $(".profile-card__name").text() // const descriptionBefore = $(".profile-card-loc__txt").text() // const heightBefore = $(".profile-card__name").text() // const benchRecordBefore = $(".profile-card__name").text() // const cardioRecordBefore = $(".profile-card__name").text() const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [height, setHeight] = useState(""); const [benchRecord, setBenchRecord] = useState(""); const [cardioRecord, setCardioRecord] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); useEffect(()=>{ setName($(".profile-card__name").text()) setDescription($(".profile-card-loc__txt").text()) }) const editProfile = () => { $('.input-name').css("opacity", "100%") $('.input-description').css("opacity", "100%") console.log(name) console.log(description) } // const Medals = [Safe, Complete, Cardio, Smart, Fabulous, New] return (
